Best Selling Pencils

Classic #2 Graphite Pencils

1. Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils #2 HB 96-Pack

Price: ~$18-24

Premium graphite with exclusive latex-free eraser. Sharpens to precise point and doesn’t smudge. Yellow classic pencils bulk pack.

2. Amazon Basics Wood-Cased #2 HB Pencils 150-Pack

Price: ~$15-20

Pre-sharpened with soft eraser top. Smooth writing graphite core. Yellow value bulk pack.

3. Dixon Ticonderoga Pencils #2 HB 12-Pack

Price: ~$4-7

Classic yellow pencils with pink erasers. Satin-smooth finish with quality graphite. Dozen premium pencils.

4. Paper Mate Everstrong #2 HB Pencils 24-Pack

Price: ~$8-13

Break-resistant lead with 90% stronger. Smudge-resistant eraser with soft grip. Black budget durable pencils.

5. Staedtler Norica HB Pencils 12-Pack

Price: ~$7-12

German engineering with PEFC certified wood. Super-bonded lead resists breaking. Yellow striped eco-friendly pencils.

Mechanical Pencils

6. Paper Mate Clearpoint Mechanical Pencils 0.7mm 12-Pack

Price: ~$12-17

Side-click advance prevents lead breakage. Jumbo twist-up eraser with comfortable grip. Assorted colors mechanical pencils.

7. BIC Xtra-Precision Mechanical Pencils 0.5mm 40-Pack

Price: ~$11-16

Soft grip barrel with #2 HB lead. 40 pencils value pack for school or office. Black budget mechanical pencils.

8. Pentel Twist-Erase III Mechanical Pencils 0.5mm

Price: ~$9-14

Jumbo twist eraser with protective tip. Comfortable latex-free grip. Assorted barrel colors quality pencils.

9. Uni Kuru Toga Mechanical Pencil 0.5mm

Price: ~$8-13

Rotating lead mechanism keeps point sharp. Prevents uneven wear for consistent lines. Black Japanese innovation pencil.

10. rOtring 600 Mechanical Pencil 0.5mm

Price: ~$24-34

Full metal barrel with hexagonal shape. Fixed lead guidance sleeve for precision. Black professional drafting pencil.

Colored & Art Pencils

11. Crayola Colored Pencils 50 Count

Price: ~$9-14

Pre-sharpened with smooth vibrant colors. Thick strong leads resist breaking. Classic kids art pencils.

12. Prismacolor Premier Colored Pencils 72-Pack

Price: ~$44-59

Soft thick cores with brilliant colors. Superior blending and shading capability. Professional artist pencils set.

13. Faber-Castell Polychromos Artists’ Pencils 36-Set

Price: ~$54-69

Oil-based with exceptional lightfastness. Rich vibrant colors with smooth application. Professional grade art pencils.

Carpenter & Construction Pencils

14. Dixon Lumber Marking Pencils 72-Pack

Price: ~$22-27

Medium soft graphite for rough surfaces. Flat shape prevents rolling. Black carpenter pencils bulk.

15. Bingdong Mechanical Carpenter Pencils 6-Pack

Price: ~$14-19

Thick 2mm lead with built-in sharpener. Refillable with clip and grip. Black professional construction pencils.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Lead Hardness: #2 HB standard for tests and writing, 2B-4B softer for sketching, H-2H harder for technical drawing
  • Wood Quality: Cedar wood sharpens smoothly and resists splintering, basswood budget alternative, incense cedar premium option
  • Eraser Quality: Latex-free prevents allergies, PVC-free environmentally friendly, replaceable on mechanical pencils extends life
  • Mechanical Lead Size: 0.5mm fine for detailed work, 0.7mm standard versatility, 0.9mm durability for heavy writing
  • Break Resistance: Bonded lead cores resist breakage 3x better, thicker mechanical leads less fragile, quality wood prevents splitting
  • Grip Comfort: Soft rubber grips reduce hand fatigue, hexagonal barrels prevent rolling, cushioned grips for extended writing
  • Value Considerations: Wood pencils cost $0.05-0.30 each in bulk, mechanical pencils $0.50-3.00 reusable with refill lead

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Best Selling Office Chairs

Ergonomic Mesh Office Chairs

1. Herman Miller Aeron Ergonomic Office Chair

Price: ~$1,395-1,645

Size B with 8Z Pellicle mesh and PostureFit SL. Adjustable arms and tilt with 12-year warranty. Mineral graphite premium office chair.

2. Steelcase Series 1 Ergonomic Office Chair

Price: ~$415-515

LiveBack technology with adjustable lumbar support. 4D adjustable arms with weight-activated mechanism. Onyx mesh professional chair.

3. Sihoo M18 Ergonomic Office Chair

Price: ~$199-249

Breathable mesh with adjustable lumbar and headrest. 3D armrests with reclining backrest. Black mid-range ergonomic chair.

4. Branch Ergonomic Chair

Price: ~$349-449

Adjustable lumbar with 4-way armrests. Italian-designed mesh with tilt tension. Gray modern office chair.

5. Duramont Ergonomic Office Chair

Price: ~$249-299

Adjustable desk chair with lumbar support and rollerblade wheels. Breathable mesh with tilt lock. Black budget ergonomic option.

Executive Leather Chairs

6. La-Z-Boy Delano Big & Tall Executive Chair

Price: ~$399-499

Memory foam cushions with AIR technology. Heavy-duty base supports up to 400 lbs. Chestnut brown bonded leather chair.

7. Serta Big & Tall Executive Office Chair

Price: ~$279-349

Layered body pillows with ergonomic lumbar zone. Supports up to 350 lbs with air-flow mesh. Black bonded leather executive chair.

8. Boss Office Products High Back Executive Chair

Price: ~$159-209

LeatherPlus upholstery with padded armrests. Pneumatic seat height adjustment with tilt. Black budget executive chair.

Gaming & Racing Style Chairs

9. Secretlab TITAN Evo 2022 Gaming Chair

Price: ~$519-619

NEO hybrid leatherette with 4-way L-ADAPT lumbar. Magnetic memory foam head pillow. Black premium gaming chair.

10. GTRACING Gaming Chair with Footrest

Price: ~$139-189

PU leather with retractable footrest and lumbar support. Reclining 90-170 degrees with Bluetooth speakers. Red budget gaming chair.

11. Homall Gaming Chair Racing Style

Price: ~$99-149

High-back with headrest and lumbar pillows. PU leather with tilt function. Red and black affordable racing chair.

Task & Desk Chairs

12. AmazonBasics Classic Office Desk Chair

Price: ~$69-99

Padded seat and back with armrests. Pneumatic height adjustment with swivel. Black budget task chair.

13. Modway Articulate Ergonomic Mesh Chair

Price: ~$149-199

Breathable mesh back with padded seat. Adjustable height and flip-up arms. Black modern task chair.

14. Flash Furniture Mid-Back Mesh Chair

Price: ~$89-129

Contoured mesh back with padded seat. Pneumatic adjustment with 5-star base. Black affordable office chair.

Stools & Drafting Chairs

15. Flash Furniture Ergonomic Drafting Chair

Price: ~$139-189

Adjustable foot ring with chrome base. Mesh back with padded seat and adjustable arms. Black tall drafting chair.

16. NOUHAUS Ergo3D Ergonomic Office Chair

Price: ~$349-449

3D lumbar support with adjustable headrest. Mesh with ElastoMesh technology. Black premium German-engineered chair.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Lumbar Support: Fixed lumbar adequate for most, adjustable height/depth customizes fit, dynamic support adapts to movement throughout day
  • Seat Cushion: Memory foam conforms to body, high-density foam maintains shape longer, mesh breathable for hot climates
  • Armrest Adjustment: Fixed arms save money, height-adjustable basic ergonomics, 4D arms (height/width/depth/angle) maximize customization
  • Recline Mechanism: Tilt lock fixes position, synchro-tilt coordinates seat and back, multi-position allows various recline angles
  • Weight Capacity: Standard 250 lbs adequate for most, big & tall 350-400 lbs for larger users, check specifications for durability
  • Warranty Coverage: Budget chairs 1-2 years, mid-range 5-7 years, premium Herman Miller/Steelcase 10-12 years with comprehensive coverage
  • Height Range: Standard 16-20” seat height suits 5’4”-6’2”, shorter/taller users need specific adjustments, check min/max specifications

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Best Selling XLR Cables

Premium XLR Microphone Cables

1. Mogami Gold Studio XLR Cable 25ft

Price: ~$69-89

Ultra-pure copper conductor with quad spiral shield. Gold-plated XLR connectors with lifetime warranty. Black professional studio standard cable.

2. Mogami Gold Studio XLR Cable 10ft

Price: ~$39-49

Neglex quad balanced cable with superior RFI and EMI rejection. Gold contacts with lifetime warranty. Black shorter studio length.

3. Monster Cable Prolink Studio Pro 1000 XLR 12ft

Price: ~$49-69

Multi-gauge wire network with 95% copper braided shield. 24k gold contacts with Duraflex jacket. Black professional microphone cable.

4. Hosa Pro XLR Cable 25ft

Price: ~$29-39

Oxygen-free copper conductors with 90% spiral shield. Neutrik connectors with lifetime warranty. Black reliable professional cable.

Budget XLR Cables

5. Amazon Basics XLR Male to Female Cable 6ft 2-Pack

Price: ~$12-18

Dual shielded balanced cable with copper conductors. Zinc alloy housing with gold-plated pins. Black budget 2-pack microphone cables.

6. LyxPro Balanced XLR Cable 10ft 2-Pack

Price: ~$16-22

Dual shielded with oxygen-free copper conductors. Metal connectors with flexible PVC jacket. Black affordable pro audio cables.

7. GLS Audio XLR Patch Cable 3ft 3-Pack

Price: ~$15-21

Short patch cables for rack equipment and pedalboards. Balanced shielded with metal XLR connectors. Black value 3-pack.

8. Cable Matters XLR to XLR Cable 6ft 2-Pack

Price: ~$13-19

24 AWG oxygen-free copper with dual shielding. Corrosion-resistant gold-plated contacts. Black budget microphone cable pack.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Cable Length Planning: 3-6ft for rack patching, 10-15ft for studio vocal booth, 25-50ft for live stage performances, 100ft+ for outdoor festivals
  • Conductor Quality: Oxygen-free copper (OFC) reduces signal degradation, multi-gauge networks improve frequency response, pure copper core maximizes clarity
  • Shielding Types: 90-95% spiral shield suits most applications, 100% foil + braid provides maximum RF/EMI rejection for noisy environments
  • Connector Grade: Neutrik XX series industry standard for durability, gold-plated contacts resist corrosion, metal housings outlast plastic alternatives
  • Balanced Signal: XLR carries balanced audio rejecting interference over long runs, essential for professional microphones and line-level connections
  • Cable Jacket: PVC flexible and affordable, rubber more durable for touring, braided fabric reduces tangling and stage noise

  • Port Configuration: Single-port delivers full wattage, multi-port splits power intelligently, desktop stations suit permanent desk setups with multiple devices
  • PD Protocol Support: USB Power Delivery 3.0/3.1 ensures compatibility and optimal charging speeds, look for PD certification for guaranteed performance
  • Foldable Plugs: Compact chargers with folding prongs prevent bag damage during travel, fixed plugs offer more stable connection for desktop use
  • Cable Inclusion: Some include USB-C cables (verify length and wattage rating), others require separate cable purchase for specific devices
  • Safety Features: Quality chargers include over-current, over-voltage, over-temperature, and short-circuit protection preventing device damage

  • Data Transfer Speeds: USB 3.0 (5Gbps) handles most tasks, USB 3.1 Gen 2 (10Gbps) benefits external SSDs, Thunderbolt 3 (40Gbps) for pro storage
  • Build Quality: Aluminum construction dissipates heat better than plastic, preventing throttling during intensive file transfers and video output
  • Size & Portability: Compact single-port adapters ideal for travel, multi-port hubs better for permanent desk setups with comprehensive connectivity
  • Compatibility Verification: Ensure hub supports your device (Mac, Windows, Chromebook) and required features (Thunderbolt 3/4, DisplayPort Alt Mode)

Key Features to Consider:

  • Data Speed Requirements: USB 2.0 (480Mbps) adequate for charging, USB 3.2 Gen 2 (10Gbps) for external SSDs, Thunderbolt 4 (40Gbps) for pro workflows
  • Power Delivery Ratings: 60W suits phones and tablets, 100W required for laptops, E-Marker chips ensure safe high-wattage charging
  • Video Capabilities: DP Alt Mode enables 4K@60Hz over USB-C, 8K requires USB 3.2 Gen 2, Thunderbolt 4 supports dual 4K displays
  • Cable Length Impact: Under 3ft maintains USB 3.2 10Gbps speeds, 6ft adequate for most setups, beyond 10ft requires active cables for high speeds
  • Build Quality: Braided nylon resists tangling and abrasion, aluminum connectors dissipate heat, strain relief prevents cable failure at connectors
  • Thunderbolt vs USB-C: Thunderbolt 4 backward compatible with USB-C but offers 4x speed and daisy-chaining, not all USB-C cables support Thunderbolt speeds
  • Certification Matters: Intel Thunderbolt certified ensures full 40Gbps, USB-IF certification guarantees spec compliance, E-Marker chips required for 5A/100W charging

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.
